his work consists of leading front-end teams, by creating an easy development environment, fixing
technical debts, applying the best practices, and mentoring juniors.

Jan 2022 - PRESENT

well-qualified engineering leadership as well as advanced technical experience.
Skillset: React.js, Next.js, Typescript, Styled-components, Web3.js, Ether.js, Cypress, Jest, Storybook
Endurance IT Services, VA - Senior Software Engineer
Sep 2013 - Dec 2021
 Offered 8-year dedicated, professional tech service to one of the largest logistics
companies in the United States, C.H. Robinson, and its branch product, Truckbase.
mailto:jonathan.lee.camb@gmail.com
https://coinmarketcap.com/currencies/dominium/
https://truckbase.ai/

services of C.H. Robinson by adopting the best practices and sorting out various
challenges.

to grant brokers and truck drivers better pricing services.
Skillset: React.js, Next.js, Javascript ES6+, Typescript, Styled-components, Redux Saga, Redux
Toolkit, Apollo GraphQL Client v3.x, GCP, AWS S3, Webworker API, D3.js
EDUCATION
Marymount University, VA - Bachelors Degree of IT
2009 - 2013

Jonathan Michael Bright 
Front End Developer
Location: TX | Email: brightjonathan11m@gmail.com | Ph: (469) 638-2969
Summary
 Around 7 Years of experience as front- end UI developer in developing dynamic Web Applications using HTML5, CSS, JavaScript, jQuery, AJAX, XML, JSON, Angular.js, React.js, Vue.js, Bootstrap and RESTful Services.
 Extensive knowledge in developing applications in a single page (SPAs) using various JavaScript frameworks like Angular, React, Vue.JS.
 Involved in all the phases of software development life cycle (SDLC), such as Analysis, Designing, Developing, Integrating, Implementing and testing of Client-Server and Web-based applications.
 Experience in Object Oriented Analysis and Design (OOAD), OOPS using Unified Modeling Language, Design Patterns, MVC Frameworks.
 Proficient and excellent hands on experience with JavaScript, jQuery, HTML, XML, CSS, Ajax.
 Good Understanding of Document Object Model (DOM) and DOM Functions.
 Strong command in leading Frameworks Team such as Angular.js, bootstrap, React.js and Node.js.
 Experienced in working with Angular.js for Client side scripting and synchronizing the applications.
 Developed frontend of application using Bootstrap (Model, View, Controller), Angular.js framework.
 Expertise in Angular.js structural framework for dynamic web apps and profound knowledge in concepts like Dependency Injection, Promises, Services, Scopes, Controllers and Directives.
 Expertise in React.js framework to develop the SPA.
 Good experience in using Reacts.js components, Forms, Events, Keys, Router, Animations and Flux concept.
 Worked on server-side scripting JavaScript framework Node.js, Express.js, created Rest APIs using Node.js and connected to MongoDB.
 Experience of responsive web design using Bootstrap framework and CSS3 media queries.
 Good knowledge about package managers like NPM, Yarn.
 Frequently used GitHub, Git and Bitbucket for version control and Jira for Project management (Issue tracking).
 Excellent analytical, problem solving and interpersonal skills. Ability to learn new concepts fast. Consistent team player with excellent communication skills.
 
Education and Certification
Bachelors of Science in Computer Science | 2015 
Dalian University of Technology, Liaoning Province
Skills
 Languages:
 HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Typescript, Python and PHP
 Frontend Frameworks:
 React.js, Angular.js, Vue.js, jQuery and Bootstrap
 Backend Frameworks:
 Node.js, Express.js, Next.js and Django, Java and Spring Boot
 Databases:
 SQL (MySQL, PostgreSQL) and NoSQL (MongoDB)
 Cloud Management:
 AWS, Azure and Google Firebase
 Tools:
 Git, GitHub, Jira, MS VS Code and MS Office Suite
 Methodologies:
 SDLC and Agile 
 Operating Systems:
 Windows and Mac OS
Experience
Frontend Lead Developer | Jan 2022  Apr 2022 
Epsilon, TX 
 Performs and/or assists with procedures in the clinical setting
 Built Rich Prototypes and Applications usingAngular, React.JS, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, jQuery, JSON, Bootstrap etc.
 Initially used Angular v10, and then upgraded the version to v12. Experienced with angular version upgrade from v10 to v12.
 Main System has many features and built with Angular and Angular material, Bootstrap, Typescript.
 Worked in the other system with React (16.18.8), React hooks, Redux, JavaScript etc.
 Improved the system performance including the loading speed, Optimization etc in Angular or React projects.
 Extensive knowledge of and use Angular.js directives to bring additional functionality to HTML.
 Good knowledge in AngularJS and Responsive Web Design.

 Created Responsive Designs (Mobile/Tablet/Desktop) using HTML & CSS, Bootstrap.
 Knowledge in using React.JS, Flux for SPA development.
 Implemented client-side Interface using React.JS.
 Construct a powerful and modern frontend architecture, involving React, Redux, and ES2015.
 Coding, styling, testing of reusableJavaScript, CSS, HTML widgets/ libraries forcomplex UI controls
 Experience in developing Single Page Applications (SPAs) using various JavaScript frameworks like React, Angular and Vue.JS
 Provided connection to social websites with feedback features by using JavaScript
 Used React.JS to make a reusable component to update a section of home page with regular intervals
 Develop web pages to interact with MySQL and PostgreSQL databases using SQL and JavaScript
 Written so many applications from the scratch using IDEs like Visual Studio 
 Handled all aspects of the web application including maintaining, testing, debugging, deploying and printing
 Used JIRA to keep track of bugs to reduce downtime, increase productivity, and improve communication.
 Involved in the maintenance and updates of several project documents, including project plan, best practices sheet, and various reports
 Communicated with multiple parties/teams to resolve technical requirements based upon business requirements
Frontend UI Developer | Jul 2021 - Dec 2021 
Dvital Solutions 
 Mainly worked with angular latest version(v13), Angular Material, Bootstrap v4, v5, typescript, JavaScript
 Worked with UI/UX development from graphic design with Figma or other design tools.
 Team work with other developers: FE dev and BE dev, graphic designers, tester etc.
 Created Responsive Web Design using Bootstrap and CSS media query.
 Used the new tags form HTML5 like section, article, header, footer, canvas for animations.
 Design, develop and test HTML, CSS, jQuery and React.JS, Redux that meets accessibility of web browser.
 Designed dynamic and multi-browser compatible pages using HTML, CSS, Angular & JavaScript.
 Develop responsive interface using Bootstrap and used SASS, SCSS for CSS.
 Worked on Cross-Browser Compatibility and tested each & every web application on popular web browsers such as Internet Explorer, Firefox, Safari, Opera and Chrome.
 Used Media Queries to deal with different CSS related issues on different devices.
 Experienced with Various operators like to map, pipe, first, last, single, debounce Time etc in Angular Rxjs.
 Also worked with react, redux, typescript, JavaScript UI development.
 Implemented JavaScript design patterns, best practices and latest technologies such as Promise, Async/Await, Closure and Callback.
 Using Jenkins AWS Code Deploy plugin to deploy to AWS
Software Engineer | Sep 2019 - May 2021 
BitStream Inc., MA 
 Ensure applications security and ability to interact with multiple APIs and databases
 Designed and created a knowledge management platform on a knowledge graph, utilizing a range of technologies, including Angular, React, Vue.js and Node.js Typescript, React.
 Core system was built by using Angular (v8, v10, 12) and Rxjs, NgRx.
 Experienced many UI features like to drag & drop, table, paginator, material designs with angular.
 More important is the experience with Rxjs operators like to map, merge Map, flat Map, switch Map, debounce Time, pipe, of, from, first, last, take, etc.

 Work closely with app development team including project and product manager, developers, and QA to determine problems, testing methods, and best practices
 Used React hooks like to use Memo, use State, use Callback, use Context, use Reducer, use History etc.
 Optimized companys complaint handling process by creating and delivering highly efficient app-based solutions
 Designed SQL/NoSQL database schema and optimized back-end by reducing the data transfer from database to back-end
 Conducted unit and load testing for high profile customer facing applications which reduced system failure rate by 70%.
Frontend Developer | Sep 2018 - Aug 2019 
Life Partners Holdings, TX 
 Developed functional and appealing web and mobile based applications based on usability.
 Provided website maintenance and enhancements.
 Worked with Angular (v6, v8), react, material design, typescript, JavaScript for the role.
 Angular has powerful features and I experienced with the features like Material UI, angular cdk, Observable etc.
 Fully experienced with vue.js, Nuxt.js, Vue.js router, animations, etc
 Used a combination of markup languages to write web pages.
 Wrote functional requirement documents and specifications.
 Created quality mockups and prototypes on tight timelines.
 Assisted back-end developers with coding and troubleshooting.
 Created cascading style sheets (CSS) that are consistent across all browsers and platforms.
 Maintained graphic standards and branding throughout the products interface.
 Stayed up-to-date on emerging technologies
 Promoted usability best practices
Full Stack Web Developer | Sep 2015 - May 2018 
Sigma Computing, CA 
 Executed projects from start to finish.
 Designed front-end of web application using HTML, HTML5, Bootstrap, Vanilla JS, jQuery, Python.
 Proficiency in Angular v6, v8, v9, Angular Material, React hooks, React Context API, Redux, Vue.js, RxJS, NgRx, material design.
 Great experience with Angular router.
 Performed the implementation of technical documentation.
 Gained hands on expertise in Bootstrap, Foundation, Express and similar back-end Node.js as well as front-end presentation frameworks web application frameworks
 Worked independently or within a project team and with business clients to design and develop applications and to ensure the successful release of a completed document.
 Delivered applications serving global stakeholders. Focused on the delivering projects prioritized by the business channels and was accountable for all project phases including analysis, design and documentation, development, unit testing, and implementation.
 Developed multi-threaded server-based solutions for a wide range of web based applications.
 Knowledge with OAuth and RESTful Web services are a plus.
 Time management within a number of projects

Insurance Sales Agent Wellington Partners Insurance Jan 2016  Aug 2017 
 Called on policyholders to deliver and explain policy, analyze insurance programs, suggest additions or changes, or 
change beneficiaries. 
 Sold various types of insurance policies to businesses and individuals on behalf of insurance companies, including 
automobile, fire, life, property, medical, and dental insurance, or specialized policies such as medical malpractice. 
 Sought out new clientele by networking to find new customers and generate lists of prospective clients.

SOFTWARE PROJECTS 
Personal Website: www.jonyazdan.com (for additional projects and information) 
GitHub Finder 
- Developed a React.js application that allows users to search for public GitHub profiles and display user details. 
- Integrated GitHub API to permit fetching of user data to allow search functionality, display user statistics, 
contact details, and social media profiles, based on information obtained from API calls. 
- Implemented React Router to enable navigation among components and URL change without page refresh. 
- Incorporated Tailwind CSS Framework to build desktop and mobile responsive User Interfaces. 
- Utilized: HTML, Tailwind CSS, JavaScript React, React Router, React Hooks, GitHub API, Fetch API, Vercel, Git 
Real Estate Marketplace 
- Created a Real Estate platform using React.js for users to list properties for sale and rent. 
- Implemented Authentication functionality with email and password using Firebase for users to create an 
account or log in to add, modify or delete listings. 
- Enhanced user credential security by adding Forgot Password functionality to email users new passwords. 
- Integrated Geocoding API to display map and location for listed properties when users input property address. 
- Added Realtime Database via Firebase, to record listing data and to display input data on the listings page. 
- Enabled Image Hosting via Firebase, extending functionality for property images to be posted on listings. 
- Maintained API functionality following the deployment by altering the endpoint domain address 
- Secured private routing using React Router to defer non-registered users from the create listing domain. 
- Utilized: HTML, Tailwind CSS, JavaScript, React, React Router, React State, Firebase Realtime Database, 
Firebase Image Hosting, Google Authentication, Pagination, Geolocation API, Fetch API, Git, Vercel
